metadata.title: Loot Weapon Mine!
metadata.author: CURA
metadata.description:
Buy exactly one loot item (weapon or drone) per run from the Storage menu.
- Options are gated by your unlocked Transport achievements; only factions you've completed appear - Accessible from the Storage button any time it's available - Costs scrap equal to the blueprint's listed price (no freebies) - After purchase, the locker seals and the option disables for the run
中文说明： - 每局可在“仓库”中购买且仅购买 1 件战利品（武器或无人机） - 购买选项根据你已解锁的“运输（Transport）”成就解锁；只显示你已完成的派系 - 购买价格等同于蓝图标价（没有免费获取） - 购买后储物柜封存，本轮无法再次购买
Requirements & load order: - Requires FTL: Multiverse + Hyperspace - Patch after Multiverse; compatible with Judge Boon Selector
